---
title: CANON
author: ''
date: '2022-08-29'
slug: canon
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.9M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with CANON. The average
  contract duration was 3.9 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $38.9K.
  The longest contract was 8.01 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $1.6M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.9M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '815'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '132'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '16%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '42%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1.41'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '1.6M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '3.9'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '38.9K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '8.01'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '1.6M'
---
